history.content:
Free Ventures is recruiting for our internal team! Read on if you’re interested in empowering talented Berkeley students who are building new projects and companies.

Free Ventures is UC Berkeley's leading pre-seed startup accelerator, crafting highly individualized paths for founders across industries and academic backgrounds in a semester-long program. We are vertical-agnostic: Our 60+ alumni companies have tackled exciting problems in education, food tech, hardware, healthcare, and more, and have gone on to raise over $60 million from Y Combinator, Kleiner Perkins, Greylock, Accel, and 8VC.

Members of the internal team receive unparalleled exposure to Berkeley's leading startups through the process of selecting founders, operating the accelerator, and managing portfolio companies and partner relations. We spend our time helping batch companies with strategy, fundraising, marketing, and more while curating a support network of top venture capitalists, resource partners, founders, and thought leaders from around the Valley.

Infosession on Wednesday 10/20 from 8-9 pm PST at https://fb.me/e/1yKElQvnN

Applications are due on Friday 10/29 at 11:59 PST at http://www.freeventures.org/apply/. We can’t wait to read yours!
history.subject: Free Ventures - Internal Team Applications Open
